basics.name: Godra Ádám
basics.label: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a 24 years old full-stack software engineer, based in Romania. I am focused on creating better tools, better APIs and better UIs.

work.summary: Develop a b2b site that allows placement of bulk print media orders, used by giant US corporations
highlights: Storefront and admin site for marketing media webstore in TS and Vue3
Develop backend using SST, AWS lambdas and MongoDb

work.summary: Quino aims to deliver an affordable, AI-assisted learning method for students and researchers that helps attain fast and simple study practices and easier knowledge navigation in the age of information.
highlights: Rebuild Quino App with React, TS, React Query, TailwindCSS, and Zustand
Rebuild Quino Website with NextJS, TailwindCSS and Strapi

work.summary: Minyma-Technologies is a startup company which branches its research into machine learning and knowledge representation innovations with a keen interest in fintech
highlights: Build backend for the Galaxis Community Space
Create the Solidity smart contracts governing the transactions of custom NFTs
Create blockchain architecture to automatically create community spaces

work.summary: At Accenture Industry X we developed a complex railway scheduling and inspecting system
highlights: Update the parser to support new requirements of the client
Create a migration tool to automatically update inputs of the deprecated syntax
Setup automatic validation of the new system via automatic unit and integration testing

work.summary: As an intern, I got to work on the backend of a website whose purpose was to serve those interested in the hiking competitions organized by our client. This includes registration, email sending, notifications, as well as live tracking of competitors on the site via the use fo QR codes scanned and different checkpoints of the race.
highlights: Upgrade the dependecies of the applications and fix subsequent broken components
Architect the gitlab CI workflow of the application for streamlined integration
Implement the QR code scanning feature on the Android mobile application

awards.title: 3rd prize at CSSC 2022
awards.summary: A scientific conference for Computer Science students in Cluj-Napoca, where I presented my bachelor's thesis titled Privy Messenger

publications.name: Practical Approach to Design and Implement a P2P and E2EE Instant Messaging System

projects.name: Privy Messenger
projects.description: A truly-serverless, peer-to-peer, end-to-end encrypted messaging system

projects.name: Quino.ai
projects.description: AI assisted learning platform for students
